com.localore.localore.modelManipulation

Class RunningQuizControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.localore.localore.modelManipulation.RunningQuizControl

  • public class RunningQuizControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class for running-exercise related operations (manipulate the database). Assumes there's no more than one running-quiz in the database.

      • reportQuestionResult

        public static void reportQuestionResult(Question question,
                                        boolean correct,
                                        AppDatabase db)
        Report result of question in running quiz. Depends on type of running-quiz. For a Pair-it question: call this multiple times. Db-updates: Question in running-quiz, and Geo-object (defining question) stats.
        Parameters:
        question -
        correct -
        db -

      • nextQuestion

        public static Question nextQuestion(AppDatabase db)
        Call to start quiz, and to progress to next question. - Returns next question in a quiz-run (NULL if no more). - Db-update: current question in running-quiz.
        Parameters:
        db -
        Returns:
        Next question, or NULL if quiz is done.

      • onFinishedRunningQuiz

        public static java.lang.String onFinishedRunningQuiz(Exercise exercise,
                                                     AppDatabase db)
        Call when a quiz is finished. Updates database based on quiz-type and result. Level-quiz: If satisfactory result: Set passed and increment level, and set required reminders. Follow-up: Update nothing. Reminders: Decrement number of required reminders.
        Parameters:
        exercise -
        db -
        Returns:
        Brief feedback.
